PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-02182002-02-210,  ,  ,  ,  ND,  TB
PrecisAmendments to the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES which revise Article 15.071 (Voluntary Release After receiving a Recruitment Allowance) by stipulating that any officer or non-commissioned member who has received a recruitment allowance may not be released until they have completed their obligatory service.
Attachments
